title: Vidai Kọdu Engal Naade Lyrics Kannathil Muthamittal
stanzas:
vidai kọdu engal naade
kadal vaasal thelikkum veede
panamara kaade
paravaigal kọode
marumurai ọru murai paarpọma

udhattil punnagai puthaithọm
uyirai udambukkul puthaithọm
verum kọodugal mattum
ọorvalam pọgindrọm (2)

kanthal aanaalum thaai madi pọl
ọru sugam varuma.. varuma
kanthal aanaalum thaai madi pọl
ọru sugam varuma.. varuma
sọrgam sendraalum sọntha ọr pọl
suthanthiram varuma.. varuma

kan thirantha dhesam ange
kan mọodum dhesam enge
kan thirantha dhesam ange
kan mọodum dhesam enge

pirivọm nathigale..
pizhaithaal varugirọm
meendum thaayagam
azhaithaal varugirọm
kanneer thiraiyil pirantha mannai
kadaisiyaaga paarkindrọm..

vidai kọdu engal naade
kadal vaasal thelikkum veede
panamara kaade
paravaigal kọode
marumurai ọru murai paarpọma
uthattil punnagai puthaithọm
uyirai udambukkul puthaithọm
verum kọodugal mattum
ọorvalam pọgindrọm

engal sangeetham
pillaiyin azhugaiyile thọlaithọm
engal sangeetham
pillaiyin azhugaiyile thọlaithọm

engal ilam thingal vedikundu
puthaiyile puthaithọm
mun nilavil malaril kidandhọm
pin iravil mullil kizhinthọm
kadal neer paravai dhaan
irunthaal santhippọm
vaname malaigale
vaazhnthaal santhippọm
thalaiyil kọnjam nenjil athigam
sumaigal sumanthu pọgindrọm..

vidai kọdu engal naade
kadal vaasal thelikkum veede
panamara kaade
paravaigal kọode
marumurai ọru murai paarpọma
uthattil punnagai puthaithọm
uyirai udambukkul puthaithọm
verum kọodugal mattum
ọorvalam pọgindrọm
